THE FORD FOUNDATION
477 MADISON AVENUE
N EW YORK 22, N. Y.
June 27, 1957
Mr, Frank E. Schooley, President
Rational Association of Educational
Broadcasters
14 Gregory Hall
Urbana* Illinois
Dear Mr. Schooley:
I am pleased to advise you that The Ford Foundation has
approved a grant of $97*000 to the National Association of Educational
Broadcasters to support projects in the further professional development
of education by television and radio* in the fiscal year 1957-58.
This grant is being made in response to your letter Â©f May 22, 1957* as
modified hereby, and supplements the Foundation grant of $94*000
announced in my letter of May 21* 1956.
The attached statement sets forth the general terms and
conditions applicable to Foundation grants. If there are any points
that need clarification* or if you wish additional information* please
do not hesitate to coimnunieate with us.
Payment of the grant will be made upon receipt of your
request directed to the Treasurer of the Foundation* Mr. Richard W,
Lambourne.
On behalf of the Foundation* may I wish you every success
in carrying out this project.
Attachment
ccs Mr. Harry J. Skornia
